# R Packages

## Exploring data in packages:

Install **datacat**:

```{r, eval = FALSE}
remotes::install("jtr13/datacat")
```

View information with:

```{r, eval = FALSE}
library(datacat)
get_dataset_info("ggplot2") %>% View()
```

## List of packages with data

**alr4** 
```{r}
library(datacat)
get_dataset_info("alr4") %>% dplyr::pull(name) %>% paste(collapse = ", ")
```
**MASS** 
```{r, results='asis'}
get_dataset_info("MASS") %>% dplyr::pull(name) %>% paste(collapse = ", ")
```
